articles.title: 70% of US under storm warning as deep freeze hits - CNA
articles.description: CHICAGO: A historic and brutal winter storm put 240 million Americans under severe weather warnings on Friday (Dec 23) as the United States faced holiday travel chaos, with thousands of flights cancelled and major highways closed. Heavy snow and howling winds…
articles.content:
Meteorologists said it was so cold in places -23 degrees Celsius was recorded Friday in normally mild Dallas, Texas - that anyone venturing outside risked frostbite within minutes.

articles.title: Scientists reveal secrets of northern glass frogs' transparency - ABC News
articles.description: Research find some frogs in South and Central America are "hiding" their red blood cells while why are sleeping in order to become transparent.
articles.content:
Some frogs found in South and Central America have the rare ability to turn on and off their nearly transparent appearance, according to a new report in the Science journal.
